title: Rory McIlroy: What's In My Bag
headline: Rory McIlroy: What's In My Bag
description: Rory McIlroy on what clubs he plays and why -- in his own words. Learn McIlroy's favorite club, why it's so hard for him to change fairway woods and his advice on how to find the right ball for your game.
short_headline: Rory McIlroy: What's In My Bag
